Posts.Content: Thank you so much, jzpage, for your post, amazing photos and heart-stoppingly beautiful video. You are absolutely fearless to traverse narrow, rocky roads. Your adventure is more challenging than the Tour de France!! I salute you for your courage and for being an inspiration to all of us!! Thanks again for sharing your adventure and as Carol said "congratulations. " Annie
Posts.Title: Bucket list item done, Twin Peak South, Challis Idaho
